source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.
source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts

items.title: The Art of Painting Beyond Technique

visible_instructors.name: Nancy
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Painter, International Author & Art Instructor
visible_instructors.title: Nancy Reyner

items.headline: The exceptional MASTER CLASS course for painters. Empower yourself and your art.
objectives_summary: New contemporary ideas about painting. Learn how to convey emotion through the work.
How to create powerful and exciting images. Ways to keep painting from your right brain.
Understanding realism and abstraction for painting

items.title: String Math - Crochet, Braiding, Lanyards
items.headline: Learn why crochet, braiding, and lanyards work, how to manipulate them, and how to make patterns.
objectives_summary: Understand how knitting and crocheting differ and how they work.
Crochet chain, single, double half, double, and triple stitches.
Practice implementing and creating patterns for different geometric shapes worked in a straight and in a round.

items.title: Comic Books: Shading
items.headline: A step by step from basic tools to the final render of a comic character
objectives_summary: Use of the lines and shapes in our drawings
How to put and object in the space
The basics of perspective and contouring lines

items.title: Swan in Watercolour
items.headline: Step by Step Instructions to a beautiful painting!
objectives_summary: Students will learn how to bring colour, composition and techniques together to create a watercolour of a swan swimming by.
The study of the shape and unique details will guide us when negative painting (background water) is applied.
Students will be shown how to transfer any image onto a watercolour paper.

items.title: Balloon Art For Beginners!
items.headline: Unleash your creativity with balloon art! balloons shapes for beginners, and for everyone who want to make life happier!
objectives_summary: Balloon twisting for beginners

items.title: Drawing of Morgan Freeman
items.headline: Portrait of MORGAN FREEMAN Drawing Course for All
objectives_summary: Drawing Step By Step
Portrait Drawing
Pencil Drawing

items.title: Jaipur Marble 3D Painting/Relief Persian painting Stone work
items.headline: Indian folk art with stone, outliner, glass glossy metal gold emboss coloring. Type of ancient persian art/ relief art
objectives_summary: Jaipur marble painting
stone work
relief painting

items.title: Travel Sketching: Interiors in One and Two Point Perspective

visible_instructors.name: Amy
visible_instructors.job_title: New York Times Bestselling Author & Artist
visible_instructors.title: Amy Stewart

items.headline: With Ink, Watercolor, & Mixed Media
objectives_summary: How to measure perspective for indoor scenes
How to draw the room and establish major shapes such as furniture
How to add detail in ink

items.title: Abstract Still Life Painting Demonstrations

visible_instructors.name: Robert
visible_instructors.job_title: Learn To Paint Loose With Acrylics & Watercolor
visible_instructors.title: Robert Joyner

items.headline: A class filled with fresh ideas and inspiration for your next masterpiece
objectives_summary: Paint loose, expressive still life artwork
How collaging can easily change your creative approach
Color harmony

items.title: Alcohol Ink Resin Geode Agate Slice Canvas + FREE Form Mold
items.headline: How to create a Resin Geode or Agate Slice art piece on canvas. A Beginners Alcohol ink & Crystal Art Therapy.
objectives_summary: How to Create a Resin Geode/Agate Slice Art piece
Learn about the Materials Needed to create your Geode
You will learn how to use paint pens for line details

items.title: Learn To Draw Cartoon Kawaii Dessert Foods!
items.headline: Easy Drawing for Beginners
objectives_summary: Create cute dessert food characters (cookie, donut, cupcake, ice cream cone, and birthday cake).
Learn emotions associated with Kawaii facial expressions.
Practice drawing cute cartoon doodles quickly.

items.title: How to Make a Living as an Artist

visible_instructors.name: Iva
visible_instructors.job_title: Illustrator | Host of Art Side of Life
visible_instructors.title: Iva Mikles

items.headline: Proven ways to Creative Career you will love
objectives_summary: Proven ways how to make money as an artist and how much you could potentially earn
What are their characteristics, advantages and what you can expect
How you can start and sustain each one of them and most importantly your creative lifestyle

items.title: Watercolor rose
items.headline: Step by step painting tutorial of realistic watercolor floral illustration
objectives_summary: Combination of bacis watercolor techniques
How to draw a complex flower
Tips and tricks for waterolor wet-on-wet technique

items.title: Watercolours for beginners and beyond
items.headline: Students will learn how to express themselves and find their own style in the medium of watercolour.
objectives_summary: Achieve a vitality in the usage of watercolour
Understand the impact of light on the subject
Be able to paint/draw scenes of which the student can be proud

items.title: How to sew a lined skirt without a pattern
items.headline: Sew a skirt with our own body measurement and line the skirt
objectives_summary: Sewing a lined skirt without a commercial pattern, just the right fit for you
How to draft a skirt from your own body measurement
Fabric Anatomy

items.title: Liquid Substitutions in Soapmaking
items.headline: Learn to make soap with beer, wine, coffee, tea, juices, and purees.
objectives_summary: Learn all about liquid substitutions you can use in soap, their differences and benefits
Learn how to choose substitutions for your soap project
Learn to use liquid substitutions for soapmaking
